name: SmartQuotingAgent
description: An intelligent quoting assistant for HVAC product selection. It evaluates customer profiles to determine if an opportunity should be quoted or passed to a sales expert. Recommends products based on environmental and budget preferences, then offers to route the quote to a financing agent.

name: FinancingAgent
description: Receives finalized quotes and offers financing options tailored to the customer's creditworthiness. Once selected, it logs the request and provides a customer reference ID to proceed post-quote acceptance.
